text: Nosyashchiye prestol Boga i stoyashchiye okrest yego slavoslovyat Gospoda svoyego, veruyut v nego, prosyat u Nego proshcheniya veruyushchim: "Gospodi nash! Ty na vse prostirayesh' Tvoyu milost' i Tvoye znaniye; prosti tem, kotoryye v pokayanii obrashchayutsya k Tebe i idut po puti Tvoyemu; sokhrani ikh ot muki v geyenne
